data.title: The climate of Zagreb and the best time to visit
data.meta_description: Discover the climate of Zagreb. Read about average temperatures, rainfall, and the ideal months to visit.
data.text:
What’s the climate like in Zagreb?

The current climate in Zagreb features temperatures ranging from a high of 29°C to a low of 8°C throughout the year. The average yearly temperature is around 19°C. At night, temperatures in the colder months average around -1°C and in the warmer months around 18°C.

The highest temperature recorded in Zagreb in recent years was 38°C in July 2015. The lowest daytime temperature recorded was -8°C in February 2018.

On average, Zagreb gets 1342 mm of precipitation each year, including rain, snow, and hail. Of this, about 63 cm is snowfall. For comparison, New York gets 833 mm of precipitation each year.

Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Temp. max (°C) 8 9 14 18 22 28 29 28 23 19 12 8 Rainfall Rainfall (mm) 133 108 78 74 112 88 91 86 188 153 147 84 Snow (cm) 30 16 6,8 0,7 0 0 0 0 0 0 2,0 6,7

Click on the month name to see more weather details, like daily averages, temperatures, and precipitation for the past years in that month.

The best time to visit Zagreb for sunny weather is April through August. During this period, you'll have good temperatures and not too much rain, making it a great time to visit Zagreb. In the other months of the year, there's too much rain or the temperature isn't ideal for a visit if you want sunny and pleasant weather.

Discover cheap trips to Zagreb

Climate Table of Zagreb

The climate table of Zagreb shows the average temperatures, rainfall, snow, and UV index per month. The table gives an overview of the average day and night temperatures in degrees Celsius, the total amount of rainfall in millimetres, the total snowfall in centimetres, and the UV index for each month. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it's snow or hail.

Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Temp. max (°C) 8 9 14 18 22 28 29 28 23 19 12 8 Temp. min (°C) 0 1 3 7 11 16 18 17 14 9 5 1 Rainfall Rainfall (mm) 133 108 78 74 112 88 91 86 188 153 147 84 Snow (cm) 30 16 6,8 0,7 0 0 0 0 0 0 2,0 6,7 UV Index 2 3 5 6 6 6 7 7 6 4 2 2

Click on the month name to see more weather details, like daily averages, temperatures, and precipitation for the past years in that month.

Average yearly temperature: 19°C

Highest temperature: 29°C in July

Lowest temperature: 8°C in January and December

Precipitation*: 1342 mm per year, averaging 112 mm per month

Snowfall: 63 cm per year

Driest months: 74 mm in April, 78 mm in March and 84 mm in December

Wettest months: 188 mm in September, 153 mm in October and 147 mm in November

*Precipitation is measured as a combination of rain, snow, and hail

Average Temperature per Month in Zagreb

This graph shows the average maximum temperatures per month in Zagreb, Croatia. The temperatures are shown in degrees Celsius and the average is calculated based on the recorded temperatures per month from past years.

Average Rainfall per Month in Zagreb

This graph shows how much rainfall Zagreb, Croatia gets on average per month. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it's snow or hail. This makes it easy to compare how much has fallen, regardless of the form of precipitation. The amount of rainfall is measured in millimetres and the average is calculated based on the recorded rainfall per month from past years.

Average Snowfall per Month in Zagreb

This graph shows how much snow Zagreb, Croatia gets on average per month. The amount of snowfall is measured in centimetres and the average is calculated based on the recorded snowfall per month from past years.

Average UV Index per Month in Zagreb

This graph shows the average UV index per month in Zagreb, Croatia. The UV index indicates the intensity of ultraviolet radiation and ranges from 0 to a maximum of 11.

Yearly Temperature in Zagreb

This graph shows the average yearly temperature in Zagreb, Croatia. The yearly temperature, expressed in degrees Celsius, is the average of all twelve monthly temperatures summed up for that year.

Total Yearly Rainfall in Zagreb

This chart shows the total yearly rainfall in Zagreb, Croatia over the past few years. The total yearly rainfall, measured in centimetres, is the sum of all the rain that fell in the twelve months of that year.

Total Yearly Snowfall in Zagreb

This chart shows the total yearly snowfall in Zagreb, Croatia over the past few years. The total yearly snowfall, measured in centimetres, is the sum of all the snow that fell in the twelve months of that year.
